mapper.select: select f.fname from product p, product_img f where p.id_product = f.id_product and f.kind = 'main' and p.id_product = #{id_product}

select img.fname from product p left join product_img img on p.id_product = img.id_product left join product_evaluation e on p.id_product = e.id_product where img.kind = 'main' and p.platform = #{platform} group by p.name, p.price, p.relase_date, p.id_product, img.fname order by p.relase_date desc
